qrscreen.qrscantext: Scan QR Code to register your mobile phone and start your verification with ImproveID to get your modern passwordless identity credentials.
qrscreen.alignText: Align the QR code within the frame to scan.
qrscreen.continuetext: By continuing, you are agreeing to our

validationscreen.selectionText: Select the type of document you would like to use to verify you
validationscreen.makesureText: Make sure document text is legible and images are glare-free

uploadscreen.subtitle: Take a photo of the page with your headshot picture
uploadscreen.subtitledoc: Take a photo of the front of your identity card
uploadscreen.subtitleback: Take a photo of the back of your identity card
uploadscreen.subtitlecertificate: Take a photo of the front of your birth certificate
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction: Place part of your passport page in the frame.
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction1: Position the front of your license in the frame
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction2: Position the back of your license in the frame
uploadscreen.camerasubinstruction3: Position the front of your certificate in the frame

readscreen.title: Check Readablity
readscreen.subtitle: Make sure document text is legible and images are glare-free
readscreen.subtitledoc: Make sure your license details are clear to read, with no blur or glare
readscreen.subtitlecertificate: Make sure your certificate details are clear to read, with no blur or glare

selfiescreen.title: Take a Selfie
selfiescreen.subtitle: We'll compare the photo in your passport with your selfie
selfiescreen.instruction2: Wearing glasses? Make sure we can clearly see your eyes
selfiescreen.camerasubtitle: Hold your phone at eye level so that yourself is similar to a passport photo

consentsign.title: Consent and Sign
consentsign.subtitle: To complete your verification we require you to accept our terms & conditions and agree to our process of your information.
consentsign.instruction1: By clicking Next, I accept the Terms and Conditions
consentsign.instruction2: I agree to the processing of my personal data, as described in the Consent to Personal Data Processing

submitverification.title: Great, that's everything we need
submitverification.subtitle: We're now ready to verify your identity

popupmessage.successmessage: Congratulations, you have successfully completed device registration and credential issuance. Please provide your feedback and rating to help us serve you better. Thanks!
popupmessage.waitingmsg: Thanks for submitting your information. Your application requires approval. Once it is approved you will be notified with email and sms. If your application is not approved you will also be notified with a rejection reason.
popupmessage.deletemsg: Are you sure you want to Suspend your identity? You cannot use your identity after Suspending them. However, if permitted, you can reissue them.
popupmessage.fido2: Your Identity is updated with FIDO2 credential.

feedbackscreen.question: How do you feel about the support you received from us?
feedbackscreen.suggestion: Please add any comments and suggestions on anything that how can be improved?

Follow the simple steps you are
prompted for.

startverification.step2: Open the link and complete the task
startverification.step3: Check back here to finish the verification submission

aboutus.info1sub: We believe in building a safer future for the connected world with multifaceted identity and verification solutions to prevent security threats.
aboutus.info2sub: To build a fafer future for the connected world.
aboutus.info3sub: Create innovative security technologies to provide a frictionless user experience making identity and access management effortless and safer in the future.
aboutus.info4sub: ImproveID has teams in three offices: 13th St, New york, NY 10011

useraggrement.title: ImproveID, Inc.
useraggrement.instruction1:
Welcome to ImproveID, Inc. ImproveID, Inc. (“us”, “we”, or “our”) operates
 www.improveid.com (hereinafter referred to as “Service”).

Our Privacy Policy governs your visit to www.improveid.com, and explains how we collect, safeguard, and disclose information that results from your use of our Service.

We use your data to provide and improve Service. By using Service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. Unless otherwise defined in this Privacy Policy, the terms used in this Privacy Policy have the same meanings as in our Terms and Conditions. Our Terms and Conditions (“Terms”) govern all use of our Service and together with the Privacy Policy constitutes your agreement with us (“agreement”).
useraggrement.defination0: SERVICE means the www.improveid.com website operated by ImproveID, Inc.
useraggrement.defination1: PERSONAL DATA means data about a living individual who can be identified from those data (or from those and other information either in our possession or likely to come into our possession).
useraggrement.defination2: USAGE DATA is data collected automatically either generated by the use of Service or from Service infrastructure itself (for example, the duration of a page visit).
useraggrement.defination3: COOKIES are small files stored on your device (computer or mobile device).
useraggrement.defination4: DATA CONTROLLER means a natural or legal person who (either alone or jointly or in common with other persons) determines the purposes for which and the manner in which any personal data are, or are to be, processed. For the purpose of this Privacy Policy, we are a Data Controller of your data.
useraggrement.defination5: DATA PROCESSORS (OR SERVICE PROVIDERS) means any natural or legal person who processes the data on behalf of the Data Controller. We may use the services of various Service Providers in order to process your data more effectively.
useraggrement.defination6: DATA SUBJECT is any living individual who is the subject of Personal Data.
useraggrement.defination7: THE USER is the individual using our Service. The User corresponds to the Data Subject, who is the subject of Personal Data.
